about_the_game:
As a gifted member of Paranormal Property Solutions (P.P.S.), you will tackle requests from troubled clients and exorcise the evil spirits haunting their discounted property. Exercise caution as you help clients sell their house ghost-free and secure your well-earned share!

FACE THE UNKNOWN

Navigate through the diverse range of supernatural phenomena that’s plummeting the price of the property while staying alive!

EXORCISE GHOSTS

Brace yourself for chilling encounters with many ghosts, each possessing a uniquely horrifying visual appearance. Learn more about their patterns and write down their behaviors in your trusty journal to learn how to survive. Finding the belongings where they store their curses is key to the exorcism, but so is making it out alive!

  • Darkness
    Apparitions do not like the light, so you can only have limited amount of lights open at any given time or else risk tripping the breaker. However, darkness in these haunted homes is not the same darkness you’re used to. Avoid it at all costs!

  • Miasma
    Fight back against an encroaching phenomena spreading in each client’s house and cleanse it. Let it get too out of hand, and fulfilling the request might be a lost cause!

USE YOUR SPECIAL ABILITY

Meet a diverse cast of characters with distinct traits, personalities, and abilities. Led by bravery, curiosity, and a relentless pursuit of truth, each member has their own unique ability to help them overcome the challenges that lay ahead!

  • Eirene is a high roller tarotist that uses her cards to impose a shared fate between her and her teammate

  • Zay is a quirky school teenager that regrets joining the team but his dog sure doesn’t

  • Luther is not only a pious priest, he is also a professional gamer.

  • Nyx is an occult enthusiast who’s got her hands on a true to life grimoire.

PURCHASE AND UTILIZE TOOLS

From ancient relics steeped in mystery to state-of-the-art ghost detection devices, equip yourself with these visually captivating tools that seamlessly blend functionality with aesthetic appeal.

Gain access to a range of specialized tools to aid you in fulfilling your client requests, such as the Ghost Magnifier, Ritual Bell, Curse Sensor and Flashlight Unit. Use all of them wisely to navigate through the threats and complete the exorcism.

EXPLORE HAUNTED LOCATIONS

Immerse yourself in meticulously designed and atmospheric environments. Discover haunted houses, eerie landscapes, and chilling locations that intensify the sense of fear and anticipation.
With limited lights, explore the dark atmosphere as you look for clues to complete your exorcism. Just make sure to be careful of what might be around the corner..
detailed_description:
JOIN THE DISCORD


About the Game

As a gifted member of Paranormal Property Solutions (P.P.S.), you will tackle requests from troubled clients and exorcise the evil spirits haunting their discounted property. Exercise caution as you help clients sell their house ghost-free and secure your well-earned share!

FACE THE UNKNOWN

Navigate through the diverse range of supernatural phenomena that’s plummeting the price of the property while staying alive!

EXORCISE GHOSTS

Brace yourself for chilling encounters with many ghosts, each possessing a uniquely horrifying visual appearance. Learn more about their patterns and write down their behaviors in your trusty journal to learn how to survive. Finding the belongings where they store their curses is key to the exorcism, but so is making it out alive!

  • Darkness
    Apparitions do not like the light, so you can only have limited amount of lights open at any given time or else risk tripping the breaker. However, darkness in these haunted homes is not the same darkness you’re used to. Avoid it at all costs!

  • Miasma
    Fight back against an encroaching phenomena spreading in each client’s house and cleanse it. Let it get too out of hand, and fulfilling the request might be a lost cause!

USE YOUR SPECIAL ABILITY

Meet a diverse cast of characters with distinct traits, personalities, and abilities. Led by bravery, curiosity, and a relentless pursuit of truth, each member has their own unique ability to help them overcome the challenges that lay ahead!

  • Eirene is a high roller tarotist that uses her cards to impose a shared fate between her and her teammate

  • Zay is a quirky school teenager that regrets joining the team but his dog sure doesn’t

  • Luther is not only a pious priest, he is also a professional gamer.

  • Nyx is an occult enthusiast who’s got her hands on a true to life grimoire.

PURCHASE AND UTILIZE TOOLS

From ancient relics steeped in mystery to state-of-the-art ghost detection devices, equip yourself with these visually captivating tools that seamlessly blend functionality with aesthetic appeal.

Gain access to a range of specialized tools to aid you in fulfilling your client requests, such as the Ghost Magnifier, Ritual Bell, Curse Sensor and Flashlight Unit. Use all of them wisely to navigate through the threats and complete the exorcism.

EXPLORE HAUNTED LOCATIONS

Immerse yourself in meticulously designed and atmospheric environments. Discover haunted houses, eerie landscapes, and chilling locations that intensify the sense of fear and anticipation.
With limited lights, explore the dark atmosphere as you look for clues to complete your exorcism. Just make sure to be careful of what might be around the corner..
name: Project Unknown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

short_description: PROJECT UNKNOWN is a 1-4 online co-op horror game with unique playable characters and special abilities. Exorcise different ghosts, utilize a variety of tools, and immerse yourself in an experience full of horrifying visuals and complex mechanics.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian*
*languages with full audio support
